anya-e0301n12:1_1: Cārittena kulācārena sobhite ñāti mitta dhana bhogasampattiyā visāle kule udayo vaḍḍhi yassa soti cārittasobhitavisālakulodayo. Tena.
anya-e0301n12:1_2: Saddhāya abhivuḍḍhānaṁ parisuddhānañca attano sīlasutacāgādiguṇānaṁ udayo vaḍḍhi etasminti saddhātivuḍḍhaparisuddhaguṇodayo. Tena.
anya-e0301n12:1_4: Paṇidhāyāti bhusaṁ nidhāya hadaye thapetvā upādāya paṭicca.
anya-e0301n12:1_5: Parānukampanti paresaṁ attano mandabuddhīnaṁ pacchimajanānaṁ anukampaṁ anudayaṁ kāruññaṁ paṇidhāyāti sambandho.
anya-e0301n12:1_7: Puññena tena vipulenāti tena vipulena abhidhammattha saṅgahapakaraṇassa karaṇapuññena.
anya-e0301n12:1_9: Vuttañhi khuddasikkhāṭīkāyaṁsīhaḷadīpe tumūlasomavihāre saṅghassa pākavattaṁpi tāla paṇṇaṁ vikkiṇitvā karīyati.
anya-e0301n12:1_10: Na hi tattha paṇṇena attho atthi.
anya-e0301n12:1_12: Eso kira vihāro ādito abhayagirirañño aggamahesibhūtāya somadeviyā kārāpitattā yāvajjatanāpi somavihārotveva paññāyittha.
anya-e0301n12:2_0: Athettha vattati saddo, tumūlo bheravo mahā;
anya-e0301n12:5_1: Soca vihāro saṭṭhimattehi mahāpariveṇehi saṇṭhito hotīti ativiya vipulo mahanto vitthiṇṇo hoti.
anya-e0301n12:5_2: Tasmā so vipulattā mahantattā vitthiṇṇattā tumūla somoti vuccati.
anya-e0301n12:5_5: Etena thero attano ācariyavaṁsassa vasana vihāraṁ kitteti.
anya-e0301n12:5_7: Dhaññādhivāsanti tasmiṁ vihāre ādikammikabhūta mahindattherādīnaṁ puññavantattherānaṁ ajjhāvuṭṭhabhūtaṁ.
anya-e0301n12:5_8: Dīpapasādaka mahāmahindattherassa hi vaṁse jātattā tasmiṁ vihāre ādikammikabhūto mahātheropi mahindattheronāmāti dhātuvaṁse vutto.
anya-e0301n12:5_10: Nabhamajjhe puṇṇacandamaṇḍalaṁ viya sakalasīhaḷadīpe ativiya uggatanti attho.
anya-e0301n12:5_11: Ariyamaggapaññāvasena pariyattivesārajjādi paññāvasenavā avadātehi pariyodātehi guṇehi sotitāti paññāvadātaguṇasotitā.
anya-e0301n12:5_14: Puññavibhāvodaya maṅgalāyāti vipulānaṁ puññānaṁ vaḍḍhisaṅkhāta maṅgalatthāya.
anya-e0301n12:5_15: Tatrāyaṁ yojanā, puññena tena vipulena dhaññādhivāsaṁ uditoditaṁ tumūlasoma vihārañca tattha nipāsino mahindattherādike paññāvadāta guṇasobhite lajjibhūte bhikkhūca puññavibhavodayamaṅgalāya āyukantaṁ maññantu pacchimā janāti.
anya-e0301n12:5_16: Athavā, taṁvihāraṁ aññe paññāvadāta guṇasobhita lajjī bhikkhū maññantūti yojanā.
anya-e0301n12:5_17: Etena thero pacchimajanānaṁ chasu anuttariyadhammesu anussatānuttariyasaṅkhātaṁ puññavisesañca mayaṁpi tādisaguṇabhāgino bhavissāmāti ussāhanupāyañca paṭipādesīti.
anya-e0301n12:21_0: Ubho lokamhi jotantu, saddhammo yāva tiṭṭhatīti.
anya-e0301n12:22_0: Tattha nagare dīparaṅgamhīti dīpavāsimahājanaṁ rañjetīti dīparaṅganti laddhanāme nagare.
anya-e0301n12:22_1: Gāme nāmaketi rohitamigānaṁ nivāsabhūmitale patiṭṭhitattā evaṁnāmake mahāgāme.
anya-e0301n12:22_3: Yā mayāti paramatthadīpanīnāma yāṭīkā mayā saṅkhatāti sambandho.
anya-e0301n12:22_6: Sārāsāravivekinanti ayaṁ sāro ayaṁ asāroti evaṁ sārañca asārañcavive cetvā jānituṁ samatthānaṁ.
anya-e0301n12:22_8: Komudasāra deti kumudapupphayutte saradautu pariyāpannepacchi makattikamāse.
